summary: Sharpens armor and removes the shorts for Hotpanzer clothing.
descriptionHtml:
Sharpens armor and removes the shorts for Hotpanzer clothing (Still UNP). 
Images are including the modified mesh along with [u]unincluded lore-friendlier retexture[/u].

Remesh by me
Credits go to [b]Tsuke76
[/b]All permissions fall under his version.

Original/Required Files:
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58400/?

[u]Retexture:
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58845/?[/u]
author: xXDeliteXx
